channel.title: New Project, Looking for bug/beta testers!
channel.description:
[center]Hey guys, I have recently started up a project and I am in need of bug/beta testers. The reason for this is so i can have a good list of things to fix as i prepare for the final release of the server. (I just wanna be sure that most bugs/dupes/glitches will be patched by release)
As a beta tester, you must always post any bug/glitch/dupe to the forums.
To be a beta tester is as simple as registering on forums, downloading the client, and posting bugs to forums :)
Info about the server: Name: GalaxyRS Revision: 317 Website/Forums: [url=http://galaxyrs.net/]http://galaxyrs.net/[/url] Base: Eco/pk bace, more Eco Base
Future plans: I plan on purchasing paid server advertisements. [/center]
[center]Server Media: [img]http://i.gyazo.com/77814ded0361947eac1035796176a687.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/00cd6cd2c9909652c50b2aab49727aad.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/e1d4f2a368a72b0bc40f5ecf07f56a9c.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/bc728fa1b050bc0ffaa2a7851899529b.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/833c40823c980211cb74f844ade77cfd.png[/img][/center]

item.title: New Project, Looking for bug/beta testers!
item.dc:creator: @stingray2121 stingray2121
item.description:
@stingray2121 wrote:

Oh trust me, not a deathlypvpz leech, far from it. i have used and ran a deathlypvpz base server and this is far from it, maybe same game frame but log in and tell me other wise

Read full topic
